tool_description: Scans PDF documents for accessibility features including tags, reading order, alternative text, and structure.

pdf_url.description: URL or path to the PDF document to scan

check_tags.description: Whether to verify PDF tagging structure

check_reading_order.description: Whether to validate logical reading order

check_color_contrast.description: Whether to analyze color contrast in PDF

extract_text.description: Whether to test text extraction capability

error_messages: Invalid PDF URL: Provide a valid URL or file path to a PDF document.
PDF not accessible: Unable to access or read the PDF file.
Corrupted PDF: The PDF file appears to be corrupted or unreadable.
Password protected: The PDF is password protected and cannot be analyzed.
usage: Provide a PDF URL or file path to scan for accessibility features. Configure specific checks for tags, reading order, and text extraction.

is_tagged.description: Whether the PDF contains accessibility tags

page_count.description: Total number of pages in the PDF

text_extractable.description: Whether text can be extracted from the PDF

structure_violations.description: List of PDF structure accessibility issues
